quote: Multiple support stations with water, snacks, and basic bike assistance spaced at regular intervals
If you enter 4 people into the team challenge you'll receive a 10% discount
Food and a kids' play area are available at the Event Village. DJ, MC and live musicians will be on the main stage from 12pm to 5pm on Saturday, followed by a Powhiri at 5:15pm.
